turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there, what would you like to do today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order a pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: order pizza from Bella Luna, ok.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How many pizza would you like to order today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like two small pizzas, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 2 small, got it, and your toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was like one with onion and sausage and the other one with spinach and mushroom and I would like them both in gluten free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 1 with onion and sausage, 1 with spinach and mushroom, all with gluten free crust right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok your total comes to 24 dollars for 2 small pizzas, shall we order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: done, your pizza are on order at the local Bella Luna pizzeria and will be ready for pickup in 30 min.
